cnipa.detailed: If it accessible, get info and store it into a json session file. Example: python -m mbapy.scripts.cnipa -q "peptide" -o "E:\peptide patents" -log

scihub.brief: download papers and it's refs(optional) from scihub.
scihub.detailed: If it can be downloaded, download and store it into session. Example: python -m mbapy.scripts.scihub -i "E:\peptide.ris" -o "E:\peptide papers" -log

scihub_selenium.brief: download papers and it's refs(optional) from scihub using selenium.
scihub_selenium.detailed: If it can be downloaded, download and store it into session. Example: python -m mbapy.scripts.scihub_selenium -i "E:\peptide.ris" -o "E:\peptide papers" -log -gui

extract_paper.brief: extract papers content to a json file.
extract_paper.detailed: If it can be parsed to sections, output each sections separatly, else all text content. Example: python -m mbapy.scripts.extract_paper -i "E:\peptide papers" -log

peptide.detailed: sub command 1: subval:     : calcu SPPS substitution value for a release test of resin. sub command 2: mw:     : calcu MW and Exact Mass for a peptide. sub command 3: mmw:     : calcu MW of each peptide mutations syn by SPPS. sub command 4: letters:     : transfer peptide repr width with 1 and 3 letters.

reviz.detailed: re-vizdom from a record.json generated by mbapy.dl_torch.utils.viz_line

mass.detailed: mass spectrum tools, such as plot mass spectrum from text file data.

avif.brief: transfer img to avif or heic format
avif.detailed: transfer img to avif or heic format.

rm.brief: delete files with specific suffix or sub-string in name
rm.detailed: delete files with specific suffix or sub-string in name.

mv.brief: move files with specific suffix or sub-string in name
mv.detailed: move files with specific suffix or sub-string in name.

file-size.brief: count files with specific suffix or sub-string in name
file-size.detailed: count files with specific suffix or sub-string in name.

hplc.detailed: HPLC tools, such as ploting HPLC from data file.
